MotivationQuote: As you start to walk out on the way, the way appears.
If you stay positive in a negative situation, you win.
When something bad happens, you have three choices. You can either let it define you, Let it destry you, or you can let it strengthen you.
Sometimes things have to go very wrong before they can be right.
Breath darling. This is just a chapter, not your whole story.
Life itself is a privilege. But toy live life to the fullest - Well. That is a choice.
I focus on what I can control and I let go of what I cannot.
Do not compare your life to others. There is no comparison between the sun and the moon. They shine when it is their time.
If you get tired, learn to rest not to quit.
Keep going, because you did not come this far just to come this far.
Good decisions come from experience. Experience comes from making bad decisions.
When thinking about life, remember this: No amount of guilt can change the past and no amount of anxiety can change the future.
You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
Do not let the behaviour of others destroy your inner peace.
If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
Do not look for a sanctuary in anyone except your self.
Happy people build their inner world, unhappy people blame their outer world.
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
If we are irritated by every rub, how will we be polished?
It's your light that lights the world.
It is good to leave each day behind. Like flowing water, free of sadness. Yesterday is gone and it's tale told. Today, new seeds are growing.
You are a volume in the divine book, a mirror to the power that created the universe. Whatever you want, ask it of yourself. Whatever you are looking for can only be found inside of you.
Your acts of kindness are iridescent wings of divine love, which linger and continue to uplift others long after your sharing.
